hero.title: Experimenta la emoción del juego sin arriesgar ni un centavo.
hero.description: FlyFlutter es un juego diseñado para brindar entretenimiento a aquellos que disfrutan de la emoción del juego pero sin utilizar dinero real. Opera en las blockchains Polygon y Mumbai utilizando el sistema de acuñación gratuita.

talkingAstronauts.bubble1: ¿Quién va a lavar los platos esta noche?

ffcmint.mintTooltip: Reglas de Acuñación de FlyFlutterCoin: Puedes acuñar solo 100 FlyFlutterCoins a la vez, pero solo si el saldo de tu billetera es inferior a 10 FFC.

ffcapprove.approveTooltip: Aprobar Contrato de Apuestas: Para realizar una apuesta, debes aprobar el contrato de apuestas para que pueda gastar una cierta cantidad de FFC en tu nombre.

betFee.caption: Tarifa de Apuesta:
betFee.tooltip: Esta tarifa de Matic se utiliza para cubrir los costos de las herramientas utilizadas para garantizar que el juego sea justo y seguro, incluido el generador de números aleatorios y los servicios de automatización.

betButton.tooltip: Debes elegir una Apuesta, una Mano y una Cantidad de Apuesta para poder realizar Apuestas. No olvides tener algunos FFC
betButton.label: Revisar y Realizar Apuesta

about.body2: A deep understanding of blockchain technology and proficient in Solidity and Typescript.
about.body3: Check out my projects below to see my work with dApps and smart contracts.

contact.title: Continuous Learning
contact.body1: As a blockchain developer, my goal is to continue to learn and explore new developments in the blockchain space. I strive to stay up to date with the latest technologies and tools in order to provide the best solutions for my clients.
contact.body2: Don't hesitate to get in touch to discuss your project needs and goals.
contact.body3: You can contact me via email at
contact.messageSent: Message sent! I will contact you as soon as possible.
contact.sendErrorMessage: Failed to send message, please try again.

rules.title: FlyFlutter Rules
rules.copy: FlutterFly is a game designed to provide entertainment to people who enjoy the thrill of gambling. It operates on the Polygon blockchain using the FlyFlutterCoin token.

rules.title: FlyFlutterCoin
rules.copy: FlyFlutterCoins are the game's native tokens, and they must be used to place bets and earn payouts within the game. They do not have any real-world value and cannot be exchanged for any other currency or asset. Each wallet can mint up to 100 FlyFlutter coins at a time, provided that the wallet balance is less than 10 FlyFlutter coins.

rules.title: Placing a Bet
rules.copy: To place a bet, a player must pay a bet cost of 0.1 MATIC and choose a value of FlyFlutterCoin between 1 and 99. The 0.1 MATIC fee is used to cover the costs of the tools used to ensure the game is fair and secure, including the random number generator and automation services.

rules.title: The House
rules.copy: The house does not make a profit from the game, and it only holds FlyFlutterCoins. It is given 10000 FFC at the start of the game. Users can donate (transfer) FlyFlutterCoin to the House.

rules.title: Accessibility
rules.copy: FlutterFly is accessible to anyone with an internet connection, and players can participate from anywhere in the world.

rules.title: Disclaimer
rules.copy: FlutterFly is a game of chance, and there is always a risk of losing when placing bets. We advise players to gamble responsibly and not to bet more than they can afford to lose.

rules.title: Changes to the Rules
rules.copy: FlutterFly is an evolving game that may change over time based on user feedback, new features implemented by contributors, and any issues that may arise. We strive to maintain transparency and fairness throughout any updates or changes to the game's rules. We encourage players to provide feedback and suggestions for improving the game.

rules.title: Conclusion
rules.copy: We hope you enjoy playing FlutterFly and wish you the best of luck!
